options.name: settings
options.description: Get or update Player settings, blank fields will be ignored. Server owned objects are always visible.

options.name: hide-character
options.description: If false, character commands will be visible to the server. Otherwise, only you can see them.

options.name: hide-player
options.description: If false, player commands will be visible to the server. Otherwise, only you can see them.

options.name: hide-item
options.description: If false, item commands will be visible to the server. Otherwise, only you can see them.
